item.description:
What a great way to start the day...a fabulous brunch, good friends and smiles all around!

Come enjoy this day with us and sample the scrumptuous food Dakota's has to offer...from omelets made to order, to tantilizing fruits...assorted entrees and carving stations to a Viennese table that will send you into orbit. What a culinary adventure for the senses!

It's happening at Dakota's, voted "best in Hartford" in 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010.  Check out the website below...

http://www.dakotarockyhill.com/RHbrunch.html

Why not give it a try!!!!!!!

* Sunday Brunch price is $20.95 for adults.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri, Chuick or the Meetup Sign...Cell # is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Dakota's of Rocky Hill...Famous Brunch! Come Join Us...
